评论概述: Lovely colors, darling design, nice details
评论详情: I have purchased this top in multiple colors.  I am writing this because I bought (and returned) other seemingly similar tops on Amazon which simply did not compare.  I want to recognize and thank this maker for a darling, well done item.  This top has nicer fabric, with excellent drape and cut.  The details are very sweet and well done.  The colors are rich and vivid.  Even the packaging and tags show an attention to detail the others lacked.  I just purchased more, because so often, good things don't last.  These will be fun to wear.  Timeless design.
I wear a 18-20 normally. I ordered the 2x and LOVE it!! It's going to be cute as a summer shirt and under my cardigans for fall! Well made and looks boutique.
Seems like really good quality and the fit and style were perfect! Definitely worth the price.

评论概述: Cute Blouse! “Red” is actually wine red/maroon. :)
评论详情: A cute and flattering blouse, with really lovely details! If you’re looking for a wine red/maroon color (like I was!), you want to order “red”. The color labeled “wine red” is actually a bright christmasy red (shown in the second pic). I think someone must have just swapped the colors when labeling them! I’m usually an 8/10 in shirts and the medium fits perfectly.

I am very impressed with this top.  The quality is as expected. The buttons down the back really make it look unique. The fit is as expected. I bought a xl in navy and xxl in the mustard color.  The most difference to me is the length. It doesn’t have any stretch.  If you are busty, you would need to size up.  Hope this helps.I am ordering another color.  I love this style!
